title: RITOOOOOO WHY WONT PAY PAL WORK!
body: Rito..trying to get the lux skin you made for me.....paypal not working plz fix

replies.body: I'm unable to see any issues with Paypal as a method of payment.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help you individually with your specific issue.  We'll reply back asap!
